ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( FS_Execution_Plan_Final_Approval__c = True, $Profile.Name != "FS AC_P", $Profile.Name != "FS CPO_P", $Profile.Name != "FS FPRS_P", $Profile.Name != "FS PIC_P", $Profile.Name != "FS PM_P", $Profile.Name != "FS Vendor PIC_P", $Profile.Name != "FS Admin PM_P", $Profile.Name != "FET System Admin", $Profile.Name != "System Administrator", OR(ISCHANGED( FS_Size_1__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Size_2__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Size_3__c ), ISCHANGED( FS_Size_4__c), ISCHANGED( FS_Size_5__c), ISCHANGED( FS_Cup_Name_1__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Cup_Name_2__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Cup_Name_2__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Cup_Name_4__c),ISCHANGED(FS_Cup_Name_5__c),ISCHANGED(FS_Finished_Ounces_1__c),ISCHANGED(FS_Finished_Ounces_2__c),ISCHANGED(FS_Finished_Ounces_2__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Finished_Ounces_3__c),ISCHANGED(FS_Finished_Ounces_4__c),ISCHANGED(FS_Finished_Ounces_5__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Portion Control cannot be update after Project Plan has been approved.
